verses.verse: I will bless <WH1288> the Lord <WH3068> at all times <WH6256>: his praise <WH8416> shall continually <WH8548> be in my mouth <WH6310>.
My soul <WH5315> shall make her boast <WH1984> in the Lord <WH3068>: the humble <WH6035> shall hear <WH8085> there <WH8055>, and be glad.
O magnify <WH1431> the Lord <WH3068> with me <WH7311>, and let us exalt his name <WH8034> together <WH3162>.
I sought <WH1875> the Lord <WH3068>, and he heard <WH6030> me <WH5337>, and delivered me from all my fears <WH4035>.
They looked <WH5027> unto him <WH5102>, and were lightened: and their faces <WH6440> were not ashamed <WH2659>.
This poor man <WH6041> cried <WH7121>, and the Lord <WH3068> heard <WH8085> him <WH3467>, and saved him out of all his troubles <WH6869>.
The angel <WH4397> of the Lord <WH3068> encamps <WH2583> round about <WH5439> them that fear <WH3373> him <WH2502>, and delivers them.
O taste <WH2938> and see <WH7200> that the Lord <WH3068> is good <WH2896>: blessed <WH835> is the man <WH1397> that trusts in him <WH2620>.
O fear <WH3372> the Lord <WH3068>, you his saints <WH6918>: for there is no want <WH4270> to them that fear him <WH3373>.
The young lions <WH3715> do lack <WH7326>, and suffer hunger <WH7456>: but they that seek <WH1875> the Lord <WH3068> shall not want <WH2637> any good thing <WH2896>.
Come <WH3212>, you sons <WH1121>, listen <WH8085> unto me <WH3925>: I will teach you the fear <WH3374> of the Lord <WH3068>.
What man <WH376> is he that desires <WH2655> life <WH2416>, and loves <WH157> many days <WH3117>, that he may see <WH7200> good <WH2896>?
Keep <WH5341> your tongue <WH3956> from evil <WH7451>, and your lips <WH8193> from speaking <WH1696> deceitfully <WH4820>.
Depart <WH5493> from evil <WH7451>, and do <WH6213> good <WH2896>; seek <WH1245> peace <WH7965>, and pursue it <WH7291>.
The eyes <WH5869> of the Lord <WH3068> are upon the righteous <WH6662>, and his ears <WH241> are open unto their cry <WH7775>.
The face <WH6440> of the Lord <WH3068> is against them that do <WH6213> evil <WH7451>, to cut off <WH3772> the memory <WH2143> of them from the earth <WH776>.
The righteous cry <WH6817>, and the Lord <WH3068> hears <WH8085>, and delivers <WH5337> them out of all their troubles <WH6869>.
The Lord <WH3068> is near <WH7138> unto them that are of a broken <WH7665> heart <WH3820>; and saves <WH3467> such as be of a contrite <WH1793> spirit <WH7307>.
Many <WH7227> are the afflictions <WH7451> of the righteous <WH6662>: but the Lord <WH3068> delivers him out of them all <WH5337>.
He keeps <WH8104> all his bones <WH6106>: not one <WH259> of them <WH2007> is broken <WH7665>.
Evil <WH7451> shall kill <WH4191> the wicked <WH7563>: and they that hate <WH8130> the righteous <WH6662> shall be desolate <WH816>.
The Lord <WH3068> redeems <WH6299> the soul <WH5315> of his servants <WH5650>: and none of them that trust <WH2620> in him shall be desolate <WH816>.
